document.full_text: japan's benchmark nikkei average closed up 5.68 percent at 9,093.72 on wednesday, while the broader topix gained 6.64 percent to 817.63.
document.title: japan's nikkei closes up 5.68 percent
lines_and_colors: japan's benchmark nikkei average closed up 5.68 percent at 9,093.72 on wednesday, while the broader topix gained 6.64 percent to 817.63.
